67#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_57600 (115200 / 2)
68#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_115200 (115200 * 1)
69#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_230400 (115200 * 2)
70#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_460800 (115200 * 4)
71#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_250000 (1000000 / 4)
72#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_500000 (1000000 / 2)
73#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_1M (1000000 * 1)
74#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_2M (1000000 * 2)
75#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_DEFAULT (AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_1M)

82#define AM_HAL_TPIU_SSPSR 0xE0040000
83#define AM_HAL_TPIU_CSPSR 0xE0040004
84#define AM_HAL_TPIU_ACPR 0xE0040010
85#define AM_HAL_TPIU_SPPR 0xE00400F0
86#define AM_HAL_TPIU_TYPE 0xE0040FC8

112#define AM_HAL_TPIU_TYPE_FIFOSZ_M 0x000001C0

122#define AM_HAL_TPIU_TRACECLKIN_750KHZ AM_REG_MCUCTRL_TPIUCTRL_CLKSEL(3)
